defineTellorCodeToStatusCode(uint256,uin.details: This function allows the user to map the tellor uint data status code to the standarized  ADO uint status code such as null, retreived etc...

defineTellorIdToBytesID(uint256,bytes32).details: Allows user to map the standarized bytes32 Id to a specific requestID from Tellor The dev should ensure the _requestId exists otherwise request the data on Tellor to get a requestId

params._id: is the descption of the ID in bytes

defineTellorIdtoAdjFactor(uint256,int256.details: This function allows the user to map the tellor's Id to it's _adjFactor and to match the standarized granularity

params._adjFactor: is 1eN where N is the number of decimals to convert to ADO standard

getBytesFromTellorID(uint256).details: Getter function of the bytes32 ADO standaraized _id based on the specified Tellor RequestID
getBytesFromTellorID(uint256).return: _id is the bytes32 descriptor mapped to an existing Tellor's requestId

getGranularityAdjFactor(bytes32).details: Getter function of the Tellor RequestID based on the specified bytes32 ADO standaraized _id

params._id: is the bytes32 descriptor mapped to an existing Tellor's requestId

getStatusFromTellorStatus(uint256).details: Getter function of the uint ADO standarized status code from the specified Tellor uint status

getTellorIdFromBytes(bytes32).details: Getter function of the Tellor RequestID based on the specified bytes32 ADO standaraized _id

params._id: is the bytes32 descriptor mapped to an existing Tellor's requestId

getTellorStatusFromStatus(uint256).details: Getter function for the uint Tellor status code from the specified uint ADO standarized status code
